<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a [[Structured Text]] by joining the given [[Structured Text | structured]] or [[String | plain]] text arguments. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[composeText]] [argument1, argument2, ...] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [argument1, argument2, ...]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> argument: [[String]] or [[Structured Text]] - use [[Structured Text]] where necessary (see [[#Examples|Example 2]]) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["Image: ", [[image]] "\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["line1", "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><br/></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>", "line2"];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>result displayed in one line</value></part></template>
[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["line1", [[lineBreak]], "line2"];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>result displayed in two lines</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Structured Text]], [[formatText]], [[image]], [[lineBreak]], [[parseText]], [[text]], [[setAttributes]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
